nodes.text: Giddean Danu was a human male senator who served in the Galactic Senate of the Republic during the Clone Wars. Prior to the war's end, he supported the Delegation of 2,000 out of concern over various amendments to the constitution. As a result, Danu and his allies presented the Petition of 2,000 to Supreme Chancellor Sheev Palpatine. He wore a traditional overcoat and had black hair, dark skin and brown eyes.
Giddean Danu was played by Christopher Kirby in scenes deleted from the final release of Revenge of the Sith.
